extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns whether or not the front panel light is enabled. Returned results include "on" or "off".
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh if [ -f "/usr/bin/ipmitool" ]; then result=`/usr/bin/ipmitool chassis status | grep "Front Panel Light" | awk '{print $5}'` echo "<result>$result</result>" fi
